name: Instagram clone App

umlDiagrams.class:
classDiagram
    class User {
        +String name
        +String email
        +List~String~ dietaryPreferences
        +List~String~ dislikedIngredients
        +Integer cookingTime
        +List~String~ favoriteCuisines
        +register(): void
        +login(): boolean
        +updateProfile(): void
    }
    class MealPlan {
        +Date weekStarting
        +List~Recipe~ recipes
        +generatePlan(): void
    }
    class Recipe {
        +String title
        +List~String~ ingredients
        +List~String~ instructions
        +String cuisine
        +Integer prepTime
        +Integer cookTime
        +Integer servings
        +Map~String, Integer~ nutritionInfo
        +rateRecipe(rating: Integer): void
    }
    class ShoppingList {
        +List~String~ items
        +Boolean isPurchased
        +addToShoppingList(item: String): void
        +removeFromShoppingList(item: String): void
    }
    class Pantry {
        +List~String~ availableIngredients
        +addIngredient(ingredient: String): void
        +removeIngredient(ingredient: String): void
    }
    class AIEngine {
        +String preferenceModel
        +String dietaryRestrictionModel
        +generateRecommendations(): List~Recipe~
    }
    class GroceryDeliveryIntegration {
        +String serviceName
        +orderItems(items: List~String~): void
    }
    class NutritionTracker {
        +Map~String, Integer~ calorieIntake
        +Map~String, Integer~ macros
        +trackMeal(meal: String, quantity: Integer): void
    }
    class VoiceGuidedCooking {
        +startGuidance(): void
        +pauseGuidance(): void
        +resumeGuidance(): void
    }
    
    User "1" -- "1" MealPlan
    User "1" -- "*" Recipe : rates >
    MealPlan "1" -- "*" Recipe
    User "1" -- "1" ShoppingList
    User "1" -- "1" Pantry
    MealPlan ..> AIEngine : generates using >
    Recipe "1" -- "1" NutritionTracker : contains >
    User "1" -- "1" GroceryDeliveryIntegration : uses >
    Recipe "1" -- "1" VoiceGuidedCooking : uses >
umlDiagrams.sequence:
sequenceDiagram
    participant U as User
    participant AI as AIEngine
    participant MP as MealPlan
    participant R as Recipe
    participant SL as ShoppingList
    participant GD as GroceryDeliveryIntegration

    U->>+AI: SubmitPreferences()
    AI->>+MP: GenerateMealPlan()
    MP->>+R: SelectRecipes()
    R-->>-MP: RecipesList
    MP-->>-U: MealPlan
    U->>+SL: GenerateShoppingList()
    SL->>+R: GetIngredients()
    R-->>-SL: ShoppingItems
    U->>+GD: OrderGroceries()
    GD->>+SL: FetchShoppingList()
    SL-->>-GD: ShoppingItems
    GD-->>-U: ConfirmOrder()
umlDiagrams.entity:
erDiagram
    USER ||--o{ MEAL_PLAN : "has"
    MEAL_PLAN ||--|{ RECIPE : "includes"
    RECIPE ||--o{ INGREDIENT : "requires"
    USER ||--o{ SHOPPING_LIST : "creates"
    SHOPPING_LIST ||--|{ ITEM : "contains"
    USER ||--o{ PANTRY : "owns"
    PANTRY ||--|{ INGREDIENT : "stores"
    RECIPE ||--o{ NUTRITION_INFO : "provides"
    USER ||--o{ NUTRITION_TRACKER : "utilizes"
    NUTRITION_TRACKER ||--|{ MACROS : "tracks"
    NUTRITION_TRACKER ||--|{ CALORIES : "tracks"
umlDiagrams.component:
flowchart TB
    subgraph Client
        MobileApp[Mobile App]
        WebApp[Web App]
    end
    subgraph Backend
        AuthService[Authentication Service]
        UserProfService[User Profile Service]
        AIEngine[AI Engine]
        MealPlanService[Meal Plan Service]
        RecipeService[Recipe Service]
        NutritionService[Nutrition Tracking Service]
        GroceryService[Grocery Delivery Integration]
    end
    subgraph External
        GroceryAPI[Grocery Delivery API]
        NutriAPI[Nutrition Database API]
    end
    
    MobileApp --> AuthService
    WebApp --> AuthService
    AuthService --> UserProfService
    MobileApp --> AIEngine
    WebApp --> AIEngine
    AIEngine --> MealPlanService
    MealPlanService --> RecipeService
    MobileApp --> NutritionService
    WebApp --> NutritionService
    MobileApp --> GroceryService
    WebApp --> GroceryService
    GroceryService --> GroceryAPI
    NutritionService --> NutriAPI
umlDiagrams.architecture:
architecture-beta
    group frontend(logos:aws-amplify)[Frontend]
        service webapp(logos:aws-amplify)[Web App] in frontend
        service mobileapp(logos:aws-amplify)[Mobile App] in frontend
        
    group backend(logos:aws-lambda)[Backend]
        service authservice(logos:aws-cognito)[Authentication Service] in backend
        service userprofile(logos:aws-dynamodb)[User Profile Service] in backend
        service aien(logos:aws-sagemaker)[AI Engine] in backend
        service mealplanservice(logos:aws-lambda)[Meal Plan Service] in backend
        service recipeservice(logos:aws-lambda)[Recipe Service] in backend
        service nutrition(logos:aws-lambda)[Nutrition Tracking Service] in backend
        service grocerydelivery(logos:aws-lambda)[Grocery Delivery Integration] in backend
        
    group external(logos:internet)[External APIs]
        service groceryapi(logos:internet)[Grocery Delivery API] in external
        service nutritionapi(logos:internet)[Nutrition Database API] in external
    
    webapp:R --> L:authservice
    mobileapp:R --> L:authservice
    authservice:R --> L:userprofile
    webapp:R --> B:aien
    mobileapp:R --> B:aien
    aien:R --> L:mealplanservice
    mealplanservice:R --> L:recipeservice
    webapp:R --> L:nutrition
    mobileapp:R --> L:nutrition
    webapp:R --> L:grocerydelivery
    mobileapp:R --> L:grocerydelivery
    grocerydelivery:R --> L:groceryapi
    nutrition:R --> L:nutritionapi

documentation.prompt:
MealMuse is an intelligent meal planning app that uses AI to generate personalized recipes and weekly plans based on your taste preferences, dietary restrictions, and available ingredients. Whether you're vegan, keto, diabetic, or just trying to eat healthier, MealMuse adapts to your lifestyle in seconds. 

Users begin by selecting their dietary goals, favorite cuisines, disliked ingredients, and how much time they usually have to cook. From there, MealMuse creates a tailored weekly menu, complete with easy-to-follow recipes, portion guidance, and a smart shopping list. The app also supports pantry syncing — input what’s in your kitchen, and it recommends dishes you can cook right now.

Integrated calorie and macro tracking makes it a helpful tool for fitness and health goals. Plus, MealMuse learns with each use — the more you cook and rate meals, the better it gets at predicting what you'll love.

Additional features include integration with grocery delivery services, voice-guided cooking mode, and options for batch cooking or single servings.

MealMuse is not just a recipe app — it’s your AI-powered kitchen companion designed to save time, reduce food waste, and make healthy eating intuitive, personalized, and enjoyable.

documentation.result:
# MealMuse System Design Document

## Executive Summary
MealMuse is an AI-powered meal planning application designed to provide personalized meal recommendations based on users' dietary preferences, restrictions, available ingredients, and health goals. It aims to simplify meal planning, grocery shopping, and cooking processes, making healthy eating accessible and enjoyable. This document outlines the proposed architecture, API contracts, security considerations, and deployment strategy for MealMuse.

## Goals and Non-Goals
### Goals
- Provide personalized meal plans and recipes.
- Support dietary restrictions and preferences.
- Integrate with grocery delivery services.
- Offer calorie and macro tracking.
- Learn and adapt to user feedback.

### Non-Goals
- Real-time nutritionist support.
- Physical grocery store integration.
- In-app cooking classes.

## Proposed Architecture
### Components
- **Frontend**: Mobile and Web Applications for user interaction.
- **Backend Services**:
  - **Authentication Service**: Manages user authentication and authorization.
  - **User Profile Service**: Stores user preferences, dietary restrictions, and profile information.
  - **AI Engine**: Generates personalized meal plans and recipes.
  - **Meal Plan Service**: Manages weekly meal plans.
  - **Recipe Service**: Stores and retrieves recipes.
  - **Nutrition Tracking Service**: Tracks calorie and macro intake.
  - **Grocery Delivery Integration**: Interfaces with external grocery delivery services.
- **External APIs**:
  - **Grocery Delivery API**: Connects to grocery delivery partners.
  - **Nutrition Database API**: Provides detailed nutrition information for recipes.

### Data Models
- **User**: Stores name, email, dietary preferences, disliked ingredients, cooking time, and favorite cuisines.
- **MealPlan**: Contains a list of recipes for the week.
- **Recipe**: Includes title, ingredients, instructions, cuisine, prep and cook time, servings, and nutrition info.
- **ShoppingList**: Lists items to be purchased, tracking purchased status.
- **Pantry**: Tracks available ingredients in the user's kitchen.

### Integrations
- **Grocery Delivery Services**: Allows users to order ingredients directly from the app.
- **Nutrition Databases**: Provides accurate nutrition information for all recipes.

## API Contracts
### User Profile Management
- **POST /user/register**
  - Request: `{ "name": "John Doe", "email": "john@example.com", "password": "securePassword123" }`
  - Response: `{ "userId": "123", "name": "John Doe", "email": "john@example.com" }`
- **POST /user/login**
  - Request: `{ "email": "john@example.com", "password": "securePassword123" }`
  - Response: `{ "token": "jwt.token.here" }`

### Meal Plan Generation
- **POST /mealplan/generate**
  - Request: `{ "userId": "123", "preferences": { "dietary": ["vegan"], "dislikedIngredients": ["nuts"], "cookingTime": 30 } }`
  - Response: `{ "weekStarting": "2023-01-01", "recipes": [{ "title": "Vegan Curry", ... }] }`

## Security Considerations
- Use HTTPS for all communications.
- Implement OAuth2 for authentication and authorization.
- Store passwords securely using salted hashes.
- Regularly audit and update dependencies for security vulnerabilities.

## Failure Handling & Resilience
- Implement circuit breakers for external API calls.
- Use retries with exponential backoff for transient failures.
- Deploy services across multiple availability zones for high availability.

## Observability Plan
- **Logging**: Use structured logging for all backend services.
- **Monitoring**: Implement metrics for API response times, error rates, and system health.
- **Alerting**: Set up alerts for critical issues like service downtime or abnormal usage patterns.

## Cost Estimation
- Based on initial projections, the monthly cost for cloud services (AWS) is estimated to be around $2,000, considering compute, storage, and API request volumes.

## Deployment Infrastructure
- **Cloud Provider**: AWS
- **Compute**: AWS Lambda for serverless functions.
- **Storage**: Amazon DynamoDB for NoSQL storage.
- **API Gateway**: For managing and securing API endpoints.

## Rollout Plan
1. **Beta Testing**: Invite a limited number of users to test core features.
2. **Feedback Incorporation**: Adjust features based on user feedback.
3. **Phased Rollout**: Gradually increase the user base, monitoring for scalability issues.
4. **General Availability**: Open the app to the public with full features.

## Risks & Tradeoffs
- **AI Model Accuracy**: The effectiveness of meal recommendations depends on the AI model's accuracy, which will improve over time with more data.
- **Integration Dependencies**: Reliance on external services for grocery delivery and nutrition data introduces potential points of failure.

## Open Questions
- How will we ensure the AI engine remains unbiased in its recommendations?
- What strategies can be employed to engage users continuously and encourage feedback?

## Appendix
- UML Diagrams and additional technical specifications can be found in the supplementary materials section.

prompt:
MealMuse is an intelligent meal planning app that uses AI to generate personalized recipes and weekly plans based on your taste preferences, dietary restrictions, and available ingredients. Whether you're vegan, keto, diabetic, or just trying to eat healthier, MealMuse adapts to your lifestyle in seconds. 

Users begin by selecting their dietary goals, favorite cuisines, disliked ingredients, and how much time they usually have to cook. From there, MealMuse creates a tailored weekly menu, complete with easy-to-follow recipes, portion guidance, and a smart shopping list. The app also supports pantry syncing — input what’s in your kitchen, and it recommends dishes you can cook right now.

Integrated calorie and macro tracking makes it a helpful tool for fitness and health goals. Plus, MealMuse learns with each use — the more you cook and rate meals, the better it gets at predicting what you'll love.

Additional features include integration with grocery delivery services, voice-guided cooking mode, and options for batch cooking or single servings.

MealMuse is not just a recipe app — it’s your AI-powered kitchen companion designed to save time, reduce food waste, and make healthy eating intuitive, personalized, and enjoyable.

appCode.documentation:
To run the MealMuse app, you'll need to have Node.js and MongoDB installed on your machine. 

**Backend Setup**
1. Navigate to the backend directory.
2. Run `npm install` to install dependencies.
3. Start MongoDB if it's not already running.
4. Run `npm start` to start the server.

**Frontend Setup**
1. Navigate to the frontend directory.
2. Run `npm install` to install dependencies.
3. Run `npm start` to start the React app.

You can then navigate to `http://localhost:3000` in your browser to view the app.
